content.text:
# List of presidents of West Virginia State University

This list of presidents and principals of West Virginia State University includes all who have served as president of West Virginia State University.
Presidents
*James Edwin Campbell 1892 - 1894.
*John H. Hill, 1894 - 1898.
*James McHenry Jones, 1898 - 1909.
*Byrd Prillerman, 1909 - 1919.
*John W. Davis, 1919 - 1953.
*William J.L. Wallace, 1953 - 1973.
*Harold M. McNeill, 1973 - 1981.
*Thomas W. Cole Jr. 1982 - 1986.
*Hazo W. Carter Jr., 1987 - 2012
*Brian Hemphill, 2012 - 2016
*Anthony L. Jenkins, 2016 - 2020
*R. Charles Byers, 2020
*Nicole Pride, 2020 - 2022
*Ericke S. Cage, 2022â€“Present
